title: Ones to watch: the 12 NYFW designers you need to know – in pictures
text:
Who: Christopher John Rogers

Rogers has blazed his own path in evening wear, creating a buzz around ruffle gowns. While his peers experimented with streetwear, Rogers was working with neon bold clashing prints in voluminous shapes and embellished detailing. Taking the idea of ‘clowns on vacation’ using Italian and French Pierrot silhouettes, his debut show opened with an eye-catching iridescent green dress, followed by pops of acid brights and floral prints.Cardi B and SZA.This article contains affiliate links, which means we may earn a small commission if a reader clicks through and makes a purchase.
